Name: Pisco Punch (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: 50 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
MUDDLE cloves in base of shaker.
Add next 5 ingredients (all but sparkling wine) and SHAKE with ice.
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: A tangy, balanced combination of rich flavours. The quality of pisco used is crucial to the success of a Pisco Punch.
History: This interpretation of a Pisco Punch was created by yours truly in 2003.. Pisco Punch cocktail history
